data.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Adventure never ends with the Doom & Destiny Worlds Season Pass, featuring unique blueprints, bombastic game mods and exciting story add-ons with new missions, challenges and achievements!

**This content is featured in the "Ultimate Supporter Edition" BUNDLE**

The Season Pass includes:

  • Survival of the Nerdiest DLC - The Survival Mod will make Do&De Worlds harder, better, NERDIER.
  • Unbreakable Mode DLC - Disable gear durability and allow for a more "chillaxed" gaming experience.
  • Fantastic Quests and where to find them DLC - Unlock rare and powerful items by helping who is in need.
  • Iron Nerds DLC - Only one chance, only for the bravest. You cannot continue in case of defeat.
  • Seven Seas of Halargian - Are you nerd enough to sail through the seven seas and uncover forbidden trinkets and powers?

**Names and content are still under development and subject to change. Heartbit Interactive takes responsibility to release at least 3 major DLCs in the course of 2021 and 2022, which will be included in this Season Pass.**

data.short_description: The season pass will unlock the three premium DLCs that are planned for release in 2021 alongside the free content updates.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 512 MB Ram
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8182 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 1024 MB Ram
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
